channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 13 Best Fans for the Coolest Summer (2025)
item.description: From tower and pedestal styles to utilitarian box fans, these are our WIRED-tested favorites.

item.title: This Is Why Tesla’s Robotaxi Launch Needed Human Babysitters
item.description: On-board helpers, bad-weather suspensions, but no crashes. WIRED asked experts to grade Tesla’s Austin autonomous taxi service—and, crucially, how to ...

item.title: 15 Best Heat Protectant Sprays for Wet and Dry Hair (2025)
item.description: I spent months testing dozens of heat protectants for hair. Whether you’re blow-drying, curling, or straightening, these are the best formulas I've fo...

item.title: EU says it will continue rolling out AI legislation on schedule
item.description: The European Union said it will stick to its timeline for rolling out its AI legislation, ignoring calls by tech companies to delay the bloc's AI rule...

item.title: How to Choose the Right Soundbar (2025): Size, Price, Surround Sound, and Subwoofers
item.description: What size should you get? Do you need a subwoofer? Here’s everything you need to know when upgrading your TV’s audio.

item.title: 15 Best MagSafe Wireless Chargers (2025): Power Banks, Stands, Pads, and Travel Chargers
item.description: Keep your iPhone battery topped up with a magnetic MagSafe wireless charger.

item.title: Cluely’s ARR doubled in a week to $7M, founder Roy Lee says. But rivals are coming.
item.description: Cluely's rapid ascend may be challenged by free copycat products.

item.title: Everyone in tech has an opinion about Soham Parekh
item.description: There is now a new badge of honor for startup founders: your proximity to one previously unknown Indian software engineer named Soham Parekh.

item.title: Who is Soham Parekh, the serial moonlighter Silicon Valley startups can’t stop hiring?
item.description: Stories about Soham Parekh, a software engineer that simultaneously works at several startups, have gone viral in the last week. Who is he?

item.title: Slate Auto drops ‘under $20,000’ pricing after Trump administration ends federal EV tax credit
item.description: Slate Auto has updated its website after Congress passed President Trump's tax cut bill, which will eliminate the federal EV tax credit.
